alert.note: Alert for Isabella (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 20 at 12:29PM EDT until July 20 at 2:00PM EDT by NWS Grand Rapids
info.description: The National Weather Service in Grand Rapids has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Isabella County in central Michigan... * Until 200 PM EDT. * At 1228 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 10 miles east of Evart to near Morley, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Mount Pleasant... Clare... Shepherd... Rosebush... Lake Isabella... Brinton... Loomis... Blanchard... Delwin... Winn... Beal City... Mount Pleasant Munic... Weidman... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
